name: Roger
text:
Roger
You may be looking for Roger Hardy.
Roger was an employee of Duncan Todd.
Biography
Roger entered Duncan Todd's office and was given a payment and an order to tell "her" that she had the job. Roger then asked Todd why he let "him" make him do these things. Todd told him to not allow someone like "him" into his life.
Todd later told Roger to learn the whereabouts of Anthony Sinclair, but they were both immediately killed by Chantal Hutchens.
